entry.title: Vinod Mehra Saves Moushmi Chatterjee From Well - Comedy - Raftaar
entry.content: Watch the hindi comedy scene from the bollywood classic hindi movie Raftaar (1975) starring Moushmi Chatterjee, Vinod Mehra,Danny Denzongpa, Ranjeet, Madan Puri & Sunder. Directed by Dinesh — Ramanesh. Produced by S.I Shivadasani. Music by Sonik Omi.

entry.title: Toofan Mail - Best Comedy Scene - Madhuri Dixit, Ashok Saraf - Abodh
entry.content: Check out the best comedy scene from the bollywood classic romantic hindi family drama movie Abodh (1984) starring Madhuri Dixit, Tapas Pal, Vinod Sharma, Ashok Saraf, Mohan Choti & Dinesh Hingoo. Directed by Hiren Nag & Produced by Tarachand Barjatya. Music by Ravindra Jain.

entry.title: Tiku Talsania Superhit Comedy Scene - Bahu Beta Aur Maa
entry.content: Check out the hindi comedy scene from the superhit bollywood family drama movie Bahu Beta Aur Maa (1992) starring Satish Kaul, Rama Viz, Yogesh Chabra, Pravin Sood, Asha Chandra & Tiku Talsania. Directed by Pawan Dev & Produced by K.L Batra. Music by Surendra Kohli.

entry.title: Tiku Talsania Hit Comedy Scene - Bahu Beta Aur Maa
entry.content: Check out the hindi comedy scene from the superhit bollywood family drama movie Bahu Beta Aur Maa (1992) starring Satish Kaul, Rama Viz, Yogesh Chabra, Pravin Sood, Asha Chandra & Tiku Talsania. Directed by Pawan Dev & Produced by K.L Batra. Music by Surendra Kohli.

entry.title: Superhit Fun Scene - Vinod Mehra Trapped by Moushmi Chatterjee - Raftaar
entry.content: Watch the superhit hindi fun scene from the bollywood classic hindi movie Raftaar (1975) starring Moushmi Chatterjee, Vinod Mehra,Danny Denzongpa, Ranjeet, Madan Puri & Sunder. Directed by Dinesh — Ramanesh. Produced by S.I Shivadasani. Music by Sonik Omi.
